Title: Fields To Fights
Synopsis:
A mans dream comes true when a chance to quit his job as a farmer presence itself. Being an adventurer can be tiring and dangerous but with the rewards high and the cost of training cheap, now is the best time to seize this opportunity and maybe change his life.
As this is a hobby and learning experience chapters will be posted whenever I feel I am happy with them. If this changes I will update this.
hello reader! You can call me Zarcon and this is my very first time writing anything and I mean ANYTHING. I really want to try my hand at writing but I have some disabilities that makes it harder to so. I was hesitant at first but I still want to give it a try!
Constructive criticism is appreciated.
Picture - Found on a royalty free wedbsite.

Title: Architect of Dominion (The Darius Kane Chronicle)
Synopsis:
Ever wake up wondering, is this it? Guess what, the answer is a solid emphatic NO. Join Darius as he wakes up to a new world that just doesn't seem to like him. We got a giant rat, we've got angry trolls, and even an elven maid or a dozen. While Darius is guided by an annoying AI he would love to turn into a commode, he'll have to deal with ever increasing disasters that lady luck just love's dumping all over him.
        Darius will have to save the remaining original humans, and cobble together a badass kingdom to establish himself, so he can tell all those power hungry pricks to just "PISS OFF". He just wants to be left alone and enjoy a woman or three. Is that too much to ask?

Title: I Live a Funny Life
Synopsis:
I always wanted to study in Japan. I just finished middle school, and what better time to live the dream than starting at high school right? where youth and the hormones are at its peak.
Now i'm starting high school, standing in front of the gates, while being mistaken as a lost cosplayer.
Not a bad start right? i mean, it could be worse.
Nothing bad can happen to a foreigner that's trying to study in Japan...
Right?

Title: Everything
Synopsis: A retired veteran, who fought on the battefield couldn't live with the thought of all the horrible things that are happening on the other side of the world. He wanted to change things for the better. With the sense of vigilantism, he returns to the cruel side of the world on his own.

Title: Storia: Sins of the Fathers
Synopsis:
Kris Rosenfield has just turned 20, and is getting ready to face adulthood and the path that lies ahead of her. But when an unexpected turn of events overturns everything she ever thought she knew, she begins to question certain facts that she'd always taken for granted... like the truth behind her father's mysterious death.Masato Ikeda has stepped up to assume his father's position as a Yakuza enforcer, and one of his most important duties to the clan is to be part of a political marriage - to a vampire. What does this mean for his future, and that of his men?Tetsuya slips through the shadows of Tokyo's underworld, pulling invisible strings and uncovering insidious plots on behalf of his sensei. But do his interests fully align with that of his Guild's, or does he have an unseen agenda?
 

 
Hello, everyone! Do you enjoy urban fantasy action, adventure and battle in the vein of A Certain Magical Index and Fate/Stay Night? Do you want to see magi, vampires, and all manner of otherworldly badasses clash both in the open and behind closed doors? If you do, I present to you: Storia!  If you enjoy Brandon Sanderson's intricate and comprehensive magic systems, or Patrick Rothfuss's beautiful prose, or Stephen King's facility with language, or Max Gladstone's use of fantastic elements as a means of explaining the invisible forces that move the real world, well... I am not any of those authors. I am, however, deeply inspired and influenced by their work, and strive to approach their level of writing. I hope you give Storia a try, and do let me know what you think!

Title: The Child of Chaos
Synopsis:
Our main character in this story originally hailed from the world of Earth, and was reborn into the universe of Vanguard.
A world that contains a magical substance that can create monsters called "Daemons". Filled with death and disease, how will this new reality impact Dyrus?
The order of things has not changed for millenniums, but within this order lies a secret so grand that it can change the entire course of destiny!
The Gods have finally made their move!

Title: Sub
Synopsis:
Rob is an unremarkable young man.
Lonely, unmotivated and may very well be stuck in a dead-end job.
Nothing to look forward to but see his days repeat like any other, and he does not appear to take interest in anything besides frequenting a cafe, drinking and smoking.
There is a lack of rhythm and melody in this gent's life.
That is, until his coworker, Lisa begins to accompany him for coffee.
And perhaps the questionable dreams he begins to have.
And Elizabeth was in it.
A sad child, really.
Do not expect much.

Title: World Fragment Online
Synopsis:
World Fragment Online is the story of the player Jason who travels through the many different worlds also referred to as ‘Shards’.
 
Release Frequency: Currently Daily.
Site:  World Fragment Online

Title: Adventurer Life
Synopsis:
This is the story of young boy named Elliot and his life as a new adventurer, take place at a world where monsters, magic, and sword is real. 
Follow Elliot story and his daily life as he tries to make money from the several kinds of quest and journey around the world with his friend(s).

Title: Subversion
Synopsis:
Everything changes - that is an universal truth of life. Without change life would stagnate and, eventually, end. What if there existed beings that resisted that process, that would use any means necessary to prolong their own existence - at the expense of yours?
Drake is an ordinary guy, fresh out of college, who doesn't quite know what to do with his life. He tries his best to fit in in the world but he starts to notice that the "ordinary" starts to shift and what he used to know might not be the reality that he finds himself in.
